professional_summary.title: Diego Sánchez
professional_summary.subtitle: Software Engineer & Full Stack Developer
professional_summary.summary_2: I am currently on my last year of pursuing a degree in Software Engineering at Rey Juan Carlos University in Madrid. Throughout my studies, I have built a solid foundation in web development, algorithms, and system design.
professional_summary.summary_3: Throughout my academic career, I have complemented my learning with personal projects, where I have applied theoretical knowledge to real contexts. These experiences have allowed me to develop key skills such as problem-solving, critical thinking, and teamwork.

work_experience.description: Involved in the marketing web development team, focusing on creating and maintaining web applications.
achievements: Develop an accessibility a11y web application tool to automatically check web pages for compliance with accessibility standards.
Participate in the development of web applications using Next.js and React.
Collaborate in tasks related to upgrading and replacing outdated libraries and frameworks.

education_details.description: Last-year student, with honoring grades in web development, operative systems, and data structures.
